General.Name: Fubotv Inc
General.Description: fuboTV Inc. operates a live TV streaming platform for live sports, news, and entertainment content in the United States and internationally. The company's platform allows customers to access content through streaming devices, as well as on SmartTVs, mobile phones, tablets, and computers. fuboTV Inc. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 1290 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10104
